QuestData.Title: Spill the Tea
QuestData.Description:
It seems Tubbins and Gubbins have gone off somewhere.
I do worry about the two of them. Be a dear and check on them. One never knows what shenanigans they might be up to.
I last saw them speaking with one of the faeries from Ardenweald. They were discussing the fine art of tea making.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you've all returned safely. Wonderful!
